channel.title: Ragescape V2 based off of Project Czar
channel.description:
I just started creating another source using Project Czar.
Key: Finished Working on Needs some work
Objectives: Removed thread per client Less/No lag Right click kick method working for all staff A better working clan wars 1-2 New minigames Clan chat system
Feel free to add comments suggesting what I could add to the list.

item.title: Ragescape V2 based off of Project Czar
item.dc:creator: @the_soul The Soul
item.description:
@the_soul wrote:

[quote=“The Reaper X, post:12, topic:241251”][quote author=TimeWarp link=topic=317577.msg2520286#msg2520286 date=1225842690]
Add full perfectly working duel arena(with staking)
[/quote]full perfectly working is redundant. why not just say “perfect duel arena”. lol.

Anyways, sounds like a good idea. I haven’t seen a server out with duel arena in a while. Maybe ill snatch that idea longer down my line of development ;][/quote]
I would need to set a section of coordinates so once you enter that area, you will be able to select a player option such as “duel”, but only in that specific area.

Read full topic
